summary: The Doctor arrives in London on Christmas Eve in 1851 where he encounters the Cybermen and a man who claims he's a Time Lord called the Doctor.
cast: David Tennant|David Morrissey|Dervla Kirwan|Velile Tshabalala|Ruari Mears|Paul Kasey|Edmund Kente|Michael Bertenshaw|Jason Morell|Neil McDermott|Ashley Horne|Tom Langford|Jordan Southwell|Matthew Allick|Nicholas Briggs|Colin Baker|Tom Baker|Jon Davey|Peter Davison|Christopher Eccleston|William Hartnell|Kevin Hudson|Sylvester McCoy|Paul McGann|Jon Pertwee|Patrick Troughton
title: The Next Doctor
